entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: A magical defense of the mind against external penetration, an obscure branch of magic.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character who is being forced to study Occlumency by Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts who is teaching Harry Occlumency.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: A Ministry-appointed teacher at Hogwarts who is not to be trusted with the information about Harry's Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather and a wizard who might provide support for Harry.

relationships.description: Snape is teaching Occlumency to Harry.
Harry is not supposed to tell Dolores Umbridge about his Occlumency lessons.
